cards.rules_text: [i]Secret council[/i] – Starting with you, each player votes for war or peace. Create a 2/2 white Clone-Trooper soldier creature token for each war vote. Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle for each peace vote.

[i]Will of the Senate[/i] – Starting with you, each player votes for increased or decreased military expenditure.
